name: RicohDocs - Document Management System
short_description:
"RicohDocs" is a feature rich fully customizable document management system developed by Ricoh India. RicohDocs is developed with modular approach so that you can buy only what you need. It is a complete office automation system helps you to streamline all your business processes in a well coordinated manner. RicohDocs offers:
•	Digitization
•	Scanning
•	Indexing
•	Capturing
•	Search & Retrieval
•	Optical character recognition
•	Version Control
•	SMS Integration
•	Barcode processing, etc
Our document management system provides you a paperless office environment. It is offered on two models:  “on Ricoh Cloud” and “On premises”.
RicohDocs is easy to configure with drag and drop supported user dashboard.
RicohDocs provides you complete control over your files and documents, so you can access them from anywhere in the world. 
For more features and other details related to RicohDocs, Kindly visit our website: http://www.ricohdocs.com
summary: RicohDocs is a feature rich document management system by Ricoh India.
